briefTitle: Nurse-led Proactive Telephone Follow-up With Patients After Completion of Primary Cancer Treatment
officialTitle: How Are You Getting on? Nurse-led Proactive Telephone Follow-up With Patients After Completion of Primary Cancer Treatment Increases Their Sense of Security and Well-being
conditions: Breast Cancer, Colorectal Cancer, Prostate Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Being primarily curatively treated for breast, colorectal-, or prostate cancer

Exclusion Criteria:

* no adjuvant treatment
* no cognitive impairment
* no known alcohol or other misuse
